name: panegyrist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who praises someone or something, especially in a piece of writing or a formal speech, by saying good things about them and not mentioning any bad things: The panegyrists are right. She was a woman whose character and career people should admire. He became famous as a court panegyrist and as a powerful satirist. See also
panegyric
panegyrical
